articles.title: DeFi-проект Furucombo взломали на $14 млн - http://forklog.com/
articles.description: Команда Furucombo сообщила, что злоумышленник скомпрометировал прокси-сервер DeFi-проекта, ущерб составил около $14 млн в Ethereum и токенах ERC-20. Today at 4:47 PM UTC the Furucombo proxy was compromised by an attacker. We have deauthorized the relevant com…
articles.content:
Furucombo , - DeFi-, $14 Ethereum ERC-20.
Today at 4:47 PM UTC the Furucombo proxy was compromised by an attacker. We have deauthorized the relevant components and believe the vulnerability to be pa… [+695 chars]
